name: Galactic Miner
description:
This was my entry for Ludum Dare 40: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/galactic-miner

Gather as many minerals as you can to sell to Earth. But beware! Space Pirates are out to get your minerals, and the more minerals you have the more pirates will appear!

Deliver the minerals to Earth to decrease the pursuit and repair your ship!

Controls:

Left click = accelerate

Right click = fire

Hover over earth and stop shooting to deliver minerals!
